name: My Friend Blue (World Wild Life Project)
name_original: My Friend Blue (World Wild Life Project)
description:
Here is a link to play the game http://arcade.gamesalad.com/games/161086

My Friend Blue is a game where the player maintains the happiness of their whale and learns about the real-world implications and actions to take surrounding plastic pollution through quizzes that present information as well as actions they can take to care for their whale.
